00046   const char cb64[]="ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/";
00047 
00048   void fill_buffer_with_random_ascii(char *buf, size_t len) {
00049     size_t in_i=0, out_i=0;
00050     uint32_t u32;
00051     uint8_t *in;
00052 
00053     while (out_i < len) {
00054 
00055       u32 = (uint32_t)random();
00056       in = (uint8_t *)&u32;
00057       in_i = 0;
00058 
00059       buf[out_i++] = cb64[ in[in_i] >> 2 ];
00060       if (out_i == len)
00061         break;
00062 
00063       buf[out_i++] = cb64[ ((in[in_i] & 0x03) << 4) | ((in[in_i+1] & 0xf0) >> 4) ];
00064       if (out_i == len)
00065         break;
00066 
00067       buf[out_i++] = cb64[ ((in[in_i+1] & 0x0f) << 2) | ((in[in_i+2] & 0xc0) >> 6) ];
00068       if (out_i == len)
00069         break;
00070 
00071       buf[out_i++] = cb64[ in[in_i+2] & 0x3f ];
00072     
00073       in_i += 3;
00074     }
00075 
00076   }
00077 
00078   const char *usage[] = {
00079     "usage: random_write_test [options] <total-bytes>",
00080     "",
00081     "  options:",
00082     "    --blocksize=<n>  Size of value to write",
00083     "    --seed=<n>       Random number generator seed",
00084     "",
00085     "  This program ...",
00086     "",
00087     (const char *)0
00088   };

00094 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00095   ClientPtr hypertable_client_ptr;
00096   TablePtr table_ptr;
00097   TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00098   KeySpec key;
00099   char random_chars[4194304];
00100   char *end_random;
00101   char *value_ptr;
00102   uint64_t total = 0;
00103   size_t blocksize = 0;
00104   unsigned long seed = 1234;
00105 
00106   for (size_t i=1; i<(size_t)argc; i++) {
00107     if (argv[i][0] == '-') {
00108       if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--blocksize=", 12)) {
00109         blocksize = atoi(&argv[i][12]);
00110       }
00111       else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--seed=", 7)) {
00112         seed = atoi(&argv[i][7]);
00113       }
00114     }
00115     else {
00116       if (total != 0)
00117         Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00118       total = strtoll(argv[i], 0, 0);
00119     }
00120   }
00121 
00122   if (total == 0)
00123     Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00124 
00125   srandom(seed);
00126 
00127   if (blocksize == 0)
00128     blocksize = 1000;
00129 
00130   size_t R = total / blocksize;
00131 
00132   fill_buffer_with_random_ascii(random_chars, 4194304);
00133 
00134   end_random = random_chars + (4194304 - blocksize);
00135 
00136   try {
00137         
00138     hypertable_client_ptr = new Hypertable::Client(argv[0]);
00139 
00140     table_ptr = hypertable_client_ptr->open_table("PerfEval");
00141 
00142     mutator_ptr = table_ptr->create_mutator();
00143         
00144   }
00145   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00146     cerr << "error: " << Error::get_text(e.code()) << " - " << e.what() << endl;
00147     return 1;
00148   }
00149 
00150   memset(&key, 0, sizeof(key));
00151   key.column_family = "Field";
00152 
00153   char key_data[32];
00154 
00155   key.row_len = 12;
00156   key.row = key_data;  // Row key: a random 12-digit number.
00157   key_data[key.row_len] = '\0';
00158 
00159   Stopwatch stopwatch;
00160 
00161   {
00162     boost::progress_display progress_meter(R);
00163 
00164     try {
00165 
00166       value_ptr = random_chars;
00167 
00168       for (size_t i = 0; i < R; ++i) {
00169 
00170         key.row = random_chars + (random() % 4194250);
00171         memcpy(key_data, key.row, 12);
00172         key.row = key_data;
00173       
00174         mutator_ptr->set(key, value_ptr, blocksize);
00175 
00176         value_ptr += blocksize;
00177         if (value_ptr > end_random)
00178           value_ptr = random_chars;
00179 
00180         progress_meter += 1;
00181       }
00182 
00183       mutator_ptr->flush();
00184     }
00185     catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00186       cerr << "error: " << Error::get_text(e.code()) << " - " << e.what() << endl;
00187       _exit(1);
00188     }
00189   }
00190 
00191   stopwatch.stop();
00192 
00193   double total_written = (double)total + (double)(R*12);
00194   
00195   printf("  Elapsed time:  %.2f s\n", stopwatch.elapsed());
00196   printf(" Total inserts:  %llu\n", (Llu)R);
00197   printf("    Throughput:  %.2f bytes/s\n",
00198          total_written / stopwatch.elapsed());
00199   printf("    Throughput:  %.2f inserts/s\n",
00200          (double)R / stopwatch.elapsed());
00201 
00202 }
